name: Cheese Saw Massacre
description:
You've been tasked by Wisconsin's wildlife enthusiasts to feed the frogs in the area. Luckily, frogs love cheese and you're in Wisconsin, so why not feed them that?

Rev up your chainsaw to slice the cheese perfect for the frogs to eat without choking and dying!

Player 1 controls:

Space to rev up your chainsaw, WASD to move.

Player 2 controls:

Up and down arrow to move, left arrow to shoot.

General controls:

Numrow 1 and 2 to select singleplayer (1) or multiplayer (2), escape (Esc) to exit the game.
